Buttons


<button class="$style">...</button>
<button class="$style sml">...</button>


<button class="$style clean">...</button>
<button class="$style clean sml">...</button>

Navigation

  • Brand
  • Link
  • Link
  • Dropdown ▾
    • Link
    • Link
    • Submit

  • Brand
  • Link
  • Link
  • Dropdown ▾
    • Link
    • Link
    • Submit 
<nav class="bar $style">
    <ul>
        <li class="collapse"><a><i class="fa fa-bars"></i></a></li>

        // Brand or Logo
        <li class="brand"><a href="#">...</a></li>

        // Navigation Items
        <li><a href="#">...</a></li>

        // Dropdown Menu
        <li class="dropdown">
            <a class="dropdownitem">Dropdown</a>
            <ul>
                <li><a href="#">...</a></li>
            </ul>
        </li>

        // Right Aligned Navigation Items
        <ul class="right">
            <li><a href="#">...</a></li>
        </ul>

        // Inline Form Inputs
        <li><input type="$type"></li>
    </ul>
</nav>

<div class="breadcrumbs">
    <ul>
        <li><a href="#">...</a></li>
        <li><a href="#">...</a></li>
        <li class="active">...</li>
    </ul>
</div>

</nav>

Banners

Notices

Default: A little plain, isn't it? Success! Congratulations, it works! Error. You broke it. You have no one to blame but yourself! Warning: Something went wrong! Info: Did you know, Bacon is more delicious in Canada? Dark: Deep Space Nine. 
<notice class="$style">
    ...
</notice>

Alerts

Default: A little plain, isn't it? Success! Congratulations, it works! Error. You broke it. You have no one to blame but yourself! Warning: Something went wrong! Info: Did you know, Bacon is more delicious in Canada? Dark: Deep Space Nine. Clean: Incase your boss says your style is 'childish', and you need more 'professionalism'. 
<alert class="$style">
    ...
</alert>

Panels

Default:
A little plain, isn't it?
Success!
Congratulations, it works!
Error.
You broke it. You have no one to blame but yourself!
Warning:
Something went wrong!
Info:
Did you know, Bacon is more delicious in Canada?
Dark:
Deep Space Nine. 
<panel class="$style">
    <div class="head">...</div>
    <div class="body">...</div>
</panel>

Dismissables

×
Error: Couldn't establish a connection to the server!
×
Error: Incorrect Username / Password! 
<$element class="$style" id="close">
    <div class="dismiss">×</div>
    ...
</$element>

</table>
